titles.title: A bill for the relief of the estate of Irwin Rutman.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9061)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 7/20/1993--Introduced. Deems a named individual to have been a public safety officer on a specified date for purposes of provisions of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 relating to benefits for survivors of public safety officers. Entitles his family to death benefits under such provisions.
